item.title: 私募股权投资为何如此低迷
item.description:
一个靠举债度日的行业希望未来会有更好的日子和更多的交易。降低利率能否为卷土重来创造条件？【原文：

An industry that runs on debt is hoping better days — and more dealmaking — are ahead. Can lower interest rates set the stage for a comeback?

】

item.title: CVC支持的Zabka华沙首次公开募股计划筹资16.7亿美元
item.description: 以私募股权基金 CVC Capital Partners Plc 为首的投资者寻求在欧洲最大的连锁便利店波兰 Zabka Group SA 的首次公开募股中筹集高达 64.5 亿兹罗提（16.7 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Investors led by private equity fund CVC Capital Partners Plc seek to raise as much as 6.45 billion zloty ($1.67 billion) in an initial public offering of Poland’s Zabka Group SA, Europe’s largest chain of convenience stores.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。鲍威尔认为 "随着时间的推移"，削减将到来；波音公司考虑筹资 100 亿美元；美国港口工人举行大规模罢工。以下是市场动态。【原文：Good morning. Powell sees cuts coming “over time,” Boeing considers raising $10 billion and a major walkout by US port workers. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Sam Unsted】

item.title: 海底电缆初创公司 XLCC 旨在为英国工厂筹资 10 亿英镑
item.description: 英国初创公司 XLCC Ltd. 旨在筹集超过 10 亿英镑（13 亿美元）的资金，用于在苏格兰建立一家工厂，生产对欧洲摆脱化石燃料至关重要的海底高压电缆。【原文：The British startup XLCC Ltd. aims to raise over £1 billion ($1.3 billion) for a factory in Scotland manufacturing subsea high-voltage cables vital for Europe’s transition away from fossil fuels.】

item.title: 波音公司考虑出售股票筹资至少 100 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉相关讨论的人士透露，波音公司正在考虑通过出售新股筹集至少 100 亿美元的资金，因为这家飞机制造商正寻求补充因持续罢工而进一步耗尽的现金储备。【原文：Boeing Co. is considering raising at least $10 billion by selling new stock, as the planemaker seeks to replenish cash reserves depleted further by an ongoing strike, according to people familiar with the discussions.】

item.title: 高盛怀疑奢侈品市场反弹，Gucci 所有者开云集团下调评级至 "卖出"。
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Last week’s China-fueled rally in luxury-goods stocks is based on unstable foundations, according to Goldman Sachs Group Inc. analysts.】

item.title: 外资流入越南股市势头强劲
item.description: 过去一周，随着越南基准股票指数的上涨和越南盾汇率的持平，外资加速买入越南股票。【原文：Foreign buying of Vietnam’s stocks accelerated in the past week as the nation’s benchmark equity index rose and the Vietnamese dong was unchanged.】

item.title: 挪威九月份电动汽车销量接近2025年100%的目标
item.description: 9月份，挪威新型电动乘用车的销售量超过了96%，这使该国离明年100%销售电池驱动车型的目标越来越近。【原文：Sales of new electric passenger cars surpassed 96% in Norway in September, edging the country closer to a target of selling 100% battery driven models as of next year.】

item.title: 燃料价格下降后巴基斯坦通胀进一步放缓
item.description: 在政府降低燃料价格和食品成本缓解之后，巴基斯坦 9 月份的通货膨胀率降至近四年来的最低点。【原文：Pakistan inflation slowed to the lowest in almost four years in September after the government slashed fuel prices and food costs eased.】

item.title: 巴克莱称法国股市易受可能的增税影响
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）的策略师表示，随着政府考虑对蓝筹股公司增税以填补不断飙升的预算赤字，表现不佳的法国股市将面临进一步的痛苦。【原文：Under-performing French stocks are facing further pain as the government considers tax hikes on blue-chip companies to plug a spiraling budget deficit, Barclays Plc strategists said.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率跌破 2%，支持欧洲央行减息的赌注
item.description: 欧元区通胀率放缓，自2021年以来首次低于欧洲央行2%的目标—支持了投资者的押注，即利率下调的速度可能比之前预期的更快。【原文：Euro-area inflation slowed below the European Central Bank’s 2% target for the first time since 2021 — backing investor bets that interest rates may be lowered more quickly than previously anticipated.】

item.title: 随着降息行动的展开，南非工厂景气度上升
item.description: 由于国内外央行开始降息，南非制造商对商业环境的改善持乐观态度，其景气度升至五个月来的新高。【原文：South African manufacturers’ sentiment improved to a five-month high, amid optimism about better business conditions as central banks at home and abroad began lowering interest rates.】

item.title: 谢因鲍姆上任后，受惊的墨西哥投资者寻求经济线索
item.description: 克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆在担任墨西哥当选总统的最后几周里，几乎没有具体说明她将如何处理前任总统留下的重大经济问题。市场希望她能利用作为墨西哥总统的首次演讲来改变这一局面。【原文：Claudia Sheinbaum has spent the final weeks of her time as Mexico’s president-elect offering few specifics about how she will approach the major economic questions her predecessor is leaving behind. Markets are hoping she uses her first speech as the nation’s president to change that.】

item.title: 欧洲引领债券反弹，十月减息几乎已完全定价
item.description: 欧洲中央银行决策者奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，新的数据支持进一步降息，此后政府债券反弹，欧元从近两年的高点回落。【原文：Government bonds rallied and the euro retreated from a near two-year high after European Central Bank policymaker Olli Rehn said incoming data supports the case for further interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 奥运后假期高峰刺激毛里求斯酒店预订
item.description: 据印度洋岛国豪华酒店运营商太阳有限公司（Sun Ltd.）负责人称，在奥运会和欧洲大选推迟了假日旅游决定之后，毛里求斯的酒店预订已经恢复。【原文：Hotel bookings in Mauritius have recovered after the Olympics and European elections delayed holiday travel decisions, according to the head of Sun Ltd., an operator of luxury hotels in the Indian Ocean island nation.】

item.title: 什么是黄金签证？在哪里还能获得黄金签证？
item.description: 如果另一个国家的政府不希望你去那里，那么试图到达那里就会变得前所未有的困难和危险。2023 年，各国政府在边境执法上花费了前所未有的巨资，在寻找新生活的过程中死亡的移民人数创下了历史新高。【原文：It’s never been so difficult or dangerous to try to reach another country if its government doesn’t want you there. A record number of migrants died in their search for a new life in 2023, when governments spent unprecedented sums on border enforcement.】

item.title: 花旗银行预测改革可使尼日利亚奈拉免受油价下跌的影响
item.description: 花旗集团首席非洲经济学家大卫-考恩（David Cowan）表示，尼日利亚的奈拉面临着油价下跌的持续压力，不过结构性改革可能会帮助它比过去更好地抵御经济下滑。【原文：Nigeria’s naira faces continued pressure from falling oil prices, though structural reforms may help it withstand the downturn better than in the past, according to David Cowan, Citigroup Inc.’s chief Africa economist.】

item.title: 贝莱德的芬克说，市场对美联储多次减息的押注是错误的
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）表示，鉴于美国经济持续增长，市场对美联储降息的定价过高。【原文：BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink said the market is pricing too many interest-rate cuts from the Federal Reserve given the US economy continues to grow.】

item.title: 德国商业银行将出售可吸收损失的 AT1 债券，裕信银行也在其中
item.description: 德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）将出售新的附加一级债券，这是这家德国贷款机构自意大利竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）表示有意收购以来首次公开进军债券市场。【原文：Commerzbank AG is selling new Additional Tier 1 notes in the German lender’s first public foray into bond markets since Italian rival UniCredit SpA signaled its interest in a takeover.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长雷恩称通胀放缓为 10 月减息提供依据
item.description: 欧洲中央银行管理委员会成员奥利-雷恩（Olli Rehn）表示，通胀压力减轻和欧元区经济恶化支持本月降息。【原文：Easing inflation pressures and a deteriorating euro-zone economy support the case for an interest-rate cut this month, European Central Bank Governing Council member Olli Rehn said.】

item.title: 南非拉莫克戈帕期待国家干预电力价格
item.description: 南非电力部长 Kgosientsho Ramokgopa 表示，在国家公用事业公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.请求监管机构允许其将电价提高三分之一以上之后，他相信政府将对电价进行干预。【原文：South African Electricity Minister Kgosientsho Ramokgopa said he is confident that there will be a government intervention on electricity prices after state utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. asked a regulator to allow it raise tariffs by more than a third.】

item.title: 太平洋浪潮推动俄罗斯原油流量创六月以来新高
item.description:
周平均价格的再次下降部分抵消了出口的增长

。【原文：

Jump in exports was partly offset by another drop in weekly average prices

】

item.title: 南非拉莫克戈帕认为国家天然气计划存在 "致命缺陷
item.description: 南非电力部长 Kgosientsho Ramokgopa 表示，南非政府发展天然气供应产业的计划存在 "致命缺陷"。【原文：There are “fatal flaws” in the South African government’s plan to develop a natural gas supply industry, Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, the country’s electricity minister, said.】

item.title: 贝莱德的芬克说欧洲需要统一的银行市场
item.description: 贝莱德公司（BlackRock Inc.首席执行官拉里-芬克（Larry Fink）敦促欧洲继续统一其银行业市场，但对德国商业银行（Commerzbank AG）和意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）可能合并一事未作评论。【原文：BlackRock Inc. Chief Executive Officer Larry Fink urged Europe to continue unifying its banking market, while stopping short of commenting on a potential combination of Commerzbank AG and UniCredit SpA.】

item.title: 纳格尔称欧洲央行债券购买仅限于特殊情况
item.description: 德国央行行长约阿希姆-纳格尔（Joachim Nagel）表示，欧洲央行未来购买政府债券的行为应仅限于特殊情况。【原文：Bundesbank President Joachim Nagel said that future purchases of government bonds by the European Central Bank should be reserved for special cases.】

item.title: 部长称福特正在洽谈电动汽车回流印度事宜
item.description: 福特汽车公司正在讨论在其位于印度南部泰米尔纳德邦的工厂生产电动汽车的计划，以便在宣布关闭当地工厂三年后重新进入世界第三大汽车市场。【原文：Ford Motor Co. is discussing plans to manufacture electric vehicles at its southern India plant in Tamil Nadu for re-entering the world’s third-largest car market three years after announcing shutting its local factories.】

item.title: TPG 和 GIC 将以 75 亿美元收购能源仪表制造商 Techem
item.description: 私募股权公司 TPG Inc. 和新加坡主权财富基金 GIC Pte 同意以约 67 亿欧元（75 亿美元）的总价从多数股权所有者 Partners Group Holding AG 手中收购德国能源计量公司 Techem GmbH。【原文：Private equity firm TPG Inc. and Singapore sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte agreed to buy German energy metering company Techem GmbH from majority owner Partners Group Holding AG for a total consideration of approximately €6.7 billion ($7.5 billion).】

item.title: 印尼通胀率创三年新低，降息预期升温
item.description: 由于食品和燃料成本下降，以及对消费需求不振的担忧与日俱增，印尼消费者物价上涨速度为近三年来最慢，这使得印尼央行有可能在本月考虑采取更多宽松措施。【原文：Indonesia’s consumer prices rose at their slowest pace in nearly three years, making it likely the central bank could consider more easing this month amid easing food and fuel costs and growing concerns about tepid consumer demand.】

item.title: 瑞典经济复苏乏力，破产数量再次上升
item.description: 根据征信机构 Creditsafe 的数据，9 月份有 700 多家瑞典公司破产，其中房地产公司受到的冲击最大。【原文：More than 700 Swedish companies went bankrupt in September, with real estate companies among the hardest hit, according to data from credit reference agency Creditsafe.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市大幅下跌后将迎来上涨
item.description: 3 月，富时罗素将韩国列入其世界政府债券指数的观察名单。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：FTSE Russell kept South Korea on the watch list for inclusion in its World Government Bond Index in March. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】
